verses.roman:
māsa-dui yabe raghunātha nā kare nimantraṇa
svarūpe puchilā tabe śacīra nandana

synonyms: māsa-dui—for two months; yabe—when; raghunātha—Raghunātha dāsa; nā kare nimantraṇa—does not invite; svarūpe puchilā—inquired from Svarūpa Dāmodara; tabe—at that time; śacīra nandana—the son of mother Śacī, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: When Raghunātha dāsa neglected to invite Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu for two consecutive months, the Lord, the son of Śacī, questioned Svarūpa Dāmodara.
